name: ULTIMATE CLIMAX BALL EXTREME
description:
REQUIRES A PHONE AND INTERNET CONNECTION TO PLAY

ULTIMATE CLIMAX BALL EXTREME is a local multiplayer sports game for 2 to infinite players!

There is a ball.

There is a net.

You can jump.


It utilizes the HappyFunTimes system, allowing up to hundreds of players to join in and use their phones as a controller.

Created by Team Disaster

  • Sebastian Scaini
  • Benjamin d'Abadie
  • Peter Francis
  • Heather (Snorkelhead) Cleveland

ULTIMATE CLIMAX BALL EXTREME does not contain mature content.
